documents.document: #USER# #USER# What are you suggesting (#HASHTAG#)?!🧐 You know.. week-ends
It's also good to know that from tomorrow on we will have a little more light everyday! We need to help each other to get through this. #URL#

#USER# That's why I am angry with people like S. Hurst. She did a great thread here the other day to inform about mask wearing. But yesterday, RTS La Première, Forum, when lots of uninformed people listen, she said nothing about it! Just the same old 💩 over and over.
#USER# They WANT to ignore the schools/kids problems because they WANT you to go to work like a good sheep! Everything is under control isn't it? It ALL your responsibility anyway! Citizens wake up!🤯
#USER# Well.. I think you can guess which side I am on!🤣👅 #URL#

Omicron cases being treated in UK hospitals, education secretary says
#URL#
Sent via #USER#

#USER# #USER# #USER# This is really annoying. Families, people suffer the same. Hard to find money for a (nice!) restaurant right now. Thank god for take away. Needs a little work to make things look perfect but cheaper and safe.

Oh! the borders with 🇨🇭! But we all know that the virus is very polite and will stop before entering this country of 🦄! Like.. radioactive clouds f.ex., they never come here! #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
Just a human being being human.. we need that.. desperately! #URL#
Kids.. and vaccinated.. but 🇨🇭 is that very special place
#USER# #USER# Me too.. the cloud stopped behind the Swiss border! Radioactivity and viruses are both really scared of this messy country.. #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# #USER# Listening to a debate on the radio last Wednesday night I was totally shocked and depressed to hear Ada Marra (Socialist Vaud) agree with Amaudruz (UDC Genève). Only the Green didn't agree with the decisions but were not present at the debate. Says a lot about the press too..
#USER# The constitution is theory.. bank accounts are reality. That's the very sad truth of this country.

Oh yes! And in 🇨🇭, the land of the 'wash your hands' guy in chief (D. P. Geneva), we are victims of these policies! Drop the mask and wash your hands they say..🤷‍♀️ #HASHTAG#! It's just exhausting to repeat the same over and over again! #URL#

🇨🇭?.. On commence quand? #USER# #USER# Experts warn slow booster jab uptake will lead to hospital chaos this winter
#URL#
Sent via #USER#
#USER# #USER# It's a real struggle to keep just a little bit calm. Day after day the anger is growing.
Wtf happened to this country? What do they need to wake up? A bomb on their heads? They are an insult to the population. A shame. #URL#

Honestly it's been months that, even if you don't really want to see them, studies after studies are proving the vaccination against Covid-19 is 3 DOSES process! You are basically totally anti-science if you just ignore them. For an org like yours it's beyond irresponsible! #URL#
Most people have no idea what war does to human beings. Thank God. It's ugly, extremely ugly, for generations. I know and I am really scared right now. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# #USER# Unfortunately the whole bunch of authorities in this country seem to have gone completely psycho! Économie Suisse were always only caring about money. I must say I am a bit baffled by the attitude of the pediatricians.. it's scary 😨

#USER# It makes no sense but it's been a long time they don't make sense! If you want to get their bizarre point of view and failed tactics: they don't want to pay! The restaurant/bars lobby (like others) was hard at work saying if we close you pay! They absolutely don't want to pay!

Gorgeous beautiful and so much more intelligent than anyone else (#HASHTAG#) 🇨🇭 is 'high risk' too..! nWhere are our boosters and kids vaccines? n#USER# #USER##USER# European countries move to CDC's highest risk travel categorynn#URL#

#USER# #USER# They know what they have to do. The guidelines are in their hands. They could have done it today. No!.. we are in Switzerland. We talk, talk back and forth. It's sickening. And deadly. 😡
Oh! the borders with 🇨🇭! But we all know that the virus is very polite and will stop before entering this country of 🦄! Like.. radioactive clouds f.ex.
#USER# #USER# They take this very seriously. Responsible, efficient. 🇨🇭 has no clue what being responsible and efficient means. None.
🇨🇭 what a messed up place to live right now.. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# NOW #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# #USER# This country is just 'beautiful pictures', there's nothing much behind it. In fact there never was.
#USER# #USER# They are otherwise occupied..🤷‍♀️.. observation

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# When hand-washing becomes brain washing.. if it was only totally pathetic it would be sort of ok but it's deadly dangerous. It's an (non)organised crime. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# Please! Please! Don't feel guilty about not cleaning your hands before the 1st course! It's most probably not your hands! And while you are at it, stop feeling guilty altogether! For the future remember #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# Maybe the same reality as the 'president' of the USA who says that catching the virus is a 'blessing from god'! The result of this attitude is clear in the numbers. If no one takes fast and efficient decisions it is going to be the exact same disaster here.

#USER# It wouldn't change much. Remember 'personal responsibility'? It also stands for 'I do what I want and I don't care for others', plus the comorbidities etc.. rhetoric. Nothing really would change.

#USER# It only has to do with money. Everything in 🇨🇭 is done because of money. In case of media, they get money from the state. They're not 'state media' but they survive thanks to the money they get from the state.. .. Democracy has very little to do with the mediocrity of the media.
#USER# #USER# Of course we didn't lose 7 days! We lost a lot more! And human lives if it matters for this government at some point! 😡
#USER# #USER# Everything. Is. Under. Control. And it is the weekend now

#USER# If you have masses of people who should go to the hospital: 1 no space you stay home and what happens? 2 no more drugs AND also let's be real 3 doctors and nurses are HUMANS too! They get tired and stressed. They will not be able to resit too long. Who is going to save you?
#USER# #USER# They also have 'inflated' time and money! This is so absurd. Do they have an another motive then just 'defend' themselves! Do they want to set an 'example'? Humans..

This is exactly why we feel like we have a target on our backs 64/62y! Psychologically it is extremely hard to swallow and it makes life hell. We don't want anything fancy, just live healthy for as long as we can. It feels like we are at war with the authorities, just to survive! #URL#
#USER# Too many colors at one time. It would totally confuse our dear dear BAG!! #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# So what on earth are they doing by giving a 12 mths pass to those who got infected with this damn virus! Well.. I guess it's the 'Swiss Way' again! I am so tired and depressed of being better than everyone else! #HASHTAG# 🙄
#USER# Sometimes I feel a little/lot lost! Did they close down #USER# ? It's like we are stuck in a hell place and nothing happens.. no help!🤯 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# #USER# #USER# English (not only but..) tourists.. just 1 test to get in and enjoy the whole shebang! Restaurants, bars..
#USER# #USER# Don't they all love children, and people young and old, more than 🇨🇭! This country is so depressing, it's awful..😭

0730.. RTS La Première news: they only talk about the various calls for a Swiss "'Freedom Day, now'". No fact check, nothing. I really have questions about the quality of this kind of press, this kind of journalism. #URL#
#USER# #USER# Don't we all need boosters at some point?🤯 but shush.. we don't want to upset our dear authorities..😶🤢

115 dead. In one day. In Switzerland. In 2020. Before Christmas, New Year's and the almighty ski season. An appalling reality some don't want to see, don't want to acknowledge. For others it is a tragedy. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# Oh, I am so sorry. She shouldn't have felt necessary to show her ID and justify herself. I know by experience that it's kind of humiliating. So sorry.

#USER# If all goes well, it will be restaurants. Outside on the terrasses, when it will be warm enough! Sometime Spring or Summer. No long time indoors with too many people for the foreseeable future. But I must say that I am not really too optimistic right now.
#USER# #USER# But they don't listen and/or don't read what comes out of science and intelligence. Remember the thing called 'Trump'..
#USER# That's why they postpone openings.. some people get it! Some don't..🇨🇭

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# I hurt so much right now for all the people in this country kept in the dark, going about their daily routine without knowledge of the risks. So much incompetence is appalling.

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# 4 major surgeries.. I understand. It's so depressing to have to go to the hospital, it's bad enough without the virus. Concentrate on how much better you will be after the procedure. I know it's hard, it's just stupid 'pep talk' but.. #URL#
#USER# #USER# #USER# Between the office hours, the weekends and the holidays they didn't find the time to really address the problem.. yet! Give them a couple of years, please! #HASHTAG#
#USER# Don't know.. maybe you will feel even more depressed 😂.. FCB fan anyway!
#USER# Well I know exactly who and what gouvernemental agency should be good candidates BUT maybe they would not understand what you say!😀😡😱
It pains me so deep down to my guts. Beautiful warm day partly on the terrasse. The ambulances noises are back. Big time. It hurts.😢 #URL#

#USER# Same thing for vaccines. Financial interests are so huge that human interests and basic rights are just buried.
#USER# This smells awful like trump rhetoric!

#USER# #USER# Don't know! It all sounds so complicated to me and absurd when you are in the middle of a deadly pandemic. Every single available vaccine should be checked. Anyway, Switzerland has not bought any J&J yet. I heard they are negotiating, you know, they do negotiations so well.. 😶
In case you wonder it's not Halloween anymore.. yet..😱 #URL#

#USER# #USER# Easy answer! They are only looking at hospitalisations and deaths today. They have absolutely no will and/or interest to admit openly that this virus takes weeks to show its end game. They also have not considered long-covid effect yet. They just shut communication down. Scary.
#USER# We definitely have a huge problem with the famous 'personal responsibility' concept! Education? Sensation of living in a 'safe' country? Both and more I guess.

#USER# It is so incredibly absurd that we are still not accepting that children are at high risk. Of course it would imply to rethink a lot of the mesures in place, it would cost some more! I guess that's the foolish answer, money! 🤯

#USER# #USER# It's so sad to come to that conclusion at a time when the world, meaning humans and planet, needs help and healing. I'm old now (one of those 60+ that can die, no problem..!🤮), I don't envy young people who have to make decisions for their future lives. Very sad.
#USER# Another big issue. They don't have enough personnel in many hospitals in Switzerland. They ask positive people with 'no' symptoms to come working. Draw your own conclusions. 🙄😡
#USER# #USER# And 'finding out' by catching the damn virus is absolutely not the way to do it!

"I am very worried.." etc.. Cr*p! If you really were that worried T. Stadler, you would stop observing and start acting! All of you so called Task 'Force'. Force of what! Champions of stupid, useless press conferences! I'm so angry!🤯😡 #URL#
👇 it seems it's what this world has become. At it's not pretty to watch. 😢 #URL#

#USER# #USER# Unfortunately this virus asks the almost(!?) impossible from governments and citizens. The situation today is in fact the reflection of the infections from the last ~20 days and it will worsen at an exponential rate. Too much for brains stuck on 'now/today'.

#USER# #USER# #USER# Pandemic what Pandemic? #HASHTAG# You can also call #USER# to ask about Paxlovid and Novavax! Are they sitting on the application documents for these products or do they plan to read them and act at some point? And 4th dose ofc!🐌😡

The virus is an efficient machine. If it is not stopped it thrives. Humans have governments. They are in the position of helping the citizens to stop the virus. If they don't take their responsibility the people pay for their incompetence. Act now! #USER# #USER#

Don't let them down. Don't let us all down. Act now. Save lives, young and old, all ages. Be honest, be clear and act. Only the SAME tight mesures for ALL can be efficient. Don't talk. Don't wait. ACT. #USER# #USER# #USER# #URL#
